backend/main.mo: Defines data models, persistent maps, authorization mixin, rate limiting logic, and session handling for a logistics backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Contains metadata describing a feature request for configuring the Google Maps API key and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text summarizing various frontend files and their functionality across the application.
frontend/.env: Stores the Google Maps JavaScript API key for frontend usage.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing global UI sections, login flows, tracking form, and conditional rendering for admin and client dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin view for a specific client showing company details and tabbed shipments and invoices sections.
Provides a form for admins to validate a client's Principal ID and create or update a client profile. Submits profile data via a mutation and handles form state and errors.
Implements a dialog to create a new client account using email or mobile, auto-generating a temporary password. Submits account creation and displays the generated password for copying.
Displays a searchable table of all clients with company, GST, and mobile info. Allows selecting a client for detailed viewing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Renders the main admin dashboard with tabs for client management, tracking, revenue, MSG91, and exports. Handles authentication and client detail navigation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Exports all invoices as a CSV file using a mutation and triggers a file download. Shows loading feedback and toast notifications.
Shows a client's invoices with status badges and options to add invoices, download PDFs, or send WhatsApp reminders. Supports invoice creation via dialog and mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: UI panel for storing MSG91 API keys and verifying access tokens with backend validation and result display.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Displays revenue analytics using a line chart, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Static panel explaining that role management is disabled in password-only mode.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Shows a client's shipments and provides a dialog form to create new shipments.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Loads Google Maps and displays shipment markers using data from the backend with script-load safeguards.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Global React error boundary that displays error details and provides refresh and copy options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message for users without required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated card explaining that admin bootstrap via Internet Identity is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Password-based admin login form with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Admin logout button that logs out and scrolls to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login button component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog collecting company and contact info but no longer used; submits and closes without processing.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard with logout, support link, and tabbed views for shipments and invoices.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays a client's invoices with status badges and actions like PDF download and payment.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Card for clients to change a temporary password with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Auth wrapper providing login and signup tabs and switching to login after successful signup.
Login card supporting password-based and OTP login flows with validation and related mutations.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays active and delivered shipments for a client using query hooks and renders tables with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Implements a client signup form with validation, mutation handling, and success/error messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Provides context for storing and managing a client session token in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Adds hooks to check admin bootstrap status and run the initial admin bootstrap mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin login, token validation, logout, and session persistence with localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Empty file placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, identity loading, login state, and exposes identity through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for admin and client operations including clients, shipments, and bootstrap mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, dark mode overrides, base styles, and custom gold utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice in a new window using provided invoice data.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links for payment reminders and support messages with formatted text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps backend authentication errors to user-friendly messages with fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers and returns structured results.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a section with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, animations, and using plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, goals, and requirements for integrating Google Maps into the admin dashboard.
